mapper.sql: ID_ AS "id", REV_ AS "rev", EXECUTION_ID_ AS "executionId", PROC_INST_ID_ AS "procInstId", PROC_DEF_ID_ AS "procDefId", NAME_ AS "name", PARENT_TASK_ID_ AS "parentTaskId", DESCRIPTION_ AS "description", TASK_DEF_KEY_ AS "taskDefKey", OWNER_ AS "owner", ASSIGNEE_ AS "assignee", DELEGATION_ AS "delegation", PRIORITY_ AS "priority", CREATE_TIME_ AS "createTime", DUE_DATE_ AS "dueDate", CATEGORY_ AS "category", SUSPENSION_STATE_ AS "suspensionState", TENANT_ID_ AS "tenantId", FORM_KEY_ AS "formKey", CLAIM_TIME_ AS "claimTime"
mapper.select:
select
from act_ru_task where 1 = 1
and CREATE_TIME_ like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')

select
from act_ru_task where 1 = 1
and CREATE_TIME_ like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')

select
from act_ru_task where 1 = 1
and CREATE_TIME_ like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')

select
from act_ru_task where 1 = 1
and CREATE_TIME_ like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
mapper.sql: f.ID_ AS "id_", f.REV_ AS "rev_", f.EXECUTION_ID_ AS "execution_id_", f.PROC_INST_ID_ AS "proc_inst_id_", f.PROC_DEF_ID_ AS "proc_def_id_", f.NAME_ AS "name_", f.PARENT_TASK_ID_ AS "parent_task_id_", f.DESCRIPTION_ AS "description_", f.TASK_DEF_KEY_ AS "task_def_key_", f.OWNER_ AS "owner_", f.ASSIGNEE_ AS "assignee_", f.DELEGATION_ AS "delegation_", f.PRIORITY_ AS "priority_", f.CREATE_TIME_ AS "create_time_", f.DUE_DATE_ AS "due_date_", f.CATEGORY_ AS "category_", f.SUSPENSION_STATE_ AS "suspension_state_", f.TENANT_ID_ AS "tenant_id_", f.FORM_KEY_ AS "form_key_", f.CLAIM_TIME_ AS "claim_time_"
mapper.select:
select , p.NAME_ pname_, p.DGRM_RESOURCE_NAME_ dgrm_resource_name_ from ACT_RU_TASK f left join ACT_RE_PROCDEF p on f.PROC_DEF_ID_ = p.ID_ where 1=1
and ( p.NAME_ LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') or f.NAME_ LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') or f.ASSIGNEE_ LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') )
and f.CREATE_TIME_ >= CONCAT(#{pd.lastStart},' 00:00:00')
and f.CREATE_TIME_ <= CONCAT(#{pd.lastEnd},' 23:59:59')
and ( f.ASSIGNEE_ = #{pd.USERNAME} or f.ASSIGNEE_ in ${pd.RNUMBERS} )
order by f.CREATE_TIME_ desc

select , p.NAME_ pname_, p.DGRM_RESOURCE_NAME_ dgrm_resource_name_ from ACT_RU_TASK f left join ACT_RE_PROCDEF p on f.PROC_DEF_ID_ = p.ID_ where 1=1
and ( p.NAME_ LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') or f.NAME_ LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') or f.ASSIGNEE_ LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') )
and f.CREATE_TIME_ >= CONCAT(#{pd.lastStart},' 00:00:00')
and f.CREATE_TIME_ <= CONCAT(#{pd.lastEnd},' 23:59:59')
and ( f.ASSIGNEE_ = #{pd.USERNAME} or f.ASSIGNEE_ in ${pd.RNUMBERS} )
order by f.CREATE_TIME_ desc

select , p.NAME_ pname_, p.DGRM_RESOURCE_NAME_ dgrm_resource_name_ from ACT_RU_TASK f left join ACT_RE_PROCDEF p on f.PROC_DEF_ID_ = p.ID_ where 1=1
and ( p.NAME_ LIKE '%' || #{pd.keywords} || '%' or f.NAME_ LIKE '%' || #{pd.keywords} || '%' or f.ASSIGNEE_ LIKE '%' || #{pd.keywords} || '%' )
and f.CREATE_TIME_ >= to_timestamp(#{pd.lastStart}||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and f.CREATE_TIME_ <= to_timestamp(#{pd.lastEnd}||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and ( f.ASSIGNEE_ = #{pd.USERNAME} or f.ASSIGNEE_ in ${pd.RNUMBERS} )
order by f.CREATE_TIME_ desc

select , p.NAME_ "pname_", p.DGRM_RESOURCE_NAME_ "dgrm_resource_name_" from ACT_RU_TASK f left join ACT_RE_PROCDEF p on f.PROC_DEF_ID_ = p.ID_ where 1=1
and ( p.NAME_ LIKE '%' || #{pd.keywords} || '%' or f.NAME_ LIKE '%' || #{pd.keywords} || '%' or f.ASSIGNEE_ LIKE '%' || #{pd.keywords} || '%' )
and f.CREATE_TIME_ >= to_date(#{pd.lastStart}||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and f.CREATE_TIME_ <= to_date(#{pd.lastEnd}||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and ( f.ASSIGNEE_ = #{pd.USERNAME} or f.ASSIGNEE_ in ${pd.RNUMBERS} )
order by f.CREATE_TIME_ desc
select u.role_id as id from sys_user u WHERE u.account = #{account};
select u.role_id as id from sys_user u WHERE u.account = #{account}
select u.role_id as "id" from sys_user u WHERE u.account = #{account}
select u.role_id as "id" from sys_user u WHERE u.account = #{account}
